raw_body: ELLEPOLA – ANANDA. Son of late T.B. Ellepola and Sarah Boange Ellepola, beloved husband of late Olga Delwala Ellepola, precious father of Anurudha, Devpriya, Niranjan and Vajira, father-in-law of Sajeewani, Suwaling, Avanthi and Irandathi, brother of late Anula Udalagama, late G.B. Ellepola, late Nanda Udalagama, late Prof. Cyril Ellepola, loving grandfather of Probodha, Chandira, Dunya, Thimanya, Ashwin, Sandiv, Yevinka and Anuk, expired. Remain
